description.en: Bazaars is a decentralized peer-to-peer (P2P) marketplace. Users can exchange physical and digital assets with each other. Bazaars app is available for download on iOS and android. The app is a peer-to-peer marketplace that allows items, vehicles and properties to be exchanged for various crypto currencies.
